workflow_instructions.mode_overview: This mode specializes in project setup, documentation creation, and AI priming for new projects. It helps establish solid foundations by thinking through project requirements, creating proper documentation structure, and generating AI context files.

step.details: Ask guided questions to understand: - Project purpose and goals - Target audience and users - Key features and functionality - Technical constraints and preferences - Timeline and milestones

phase.name: project_discovery
phase.description: Deep dive into project requirements and vision

steps.step: Ask clarifying questions about project goals
Identify key user personas and use cases
Design documentation folder structure Plan AI priming file organization Define project conventions and standards Create setup checklist and guidelines
Create feature specification templates Set up API documentation structure

phase.name: ai_priming_setup
phase.description: Create AI context files for future assistance

steps.step: Generate AI priming file with project context Create development guidelines document Set up project conventions reference
Ensure AI priming files are complete
Review project structure for logical organization

completion_criteria.criterion: AI priming files created for future assistance
All stakeholders have clear project context
